page.title: 07ADVENTURE PLAYGROUND BUNNY
page.content: At the far side of the school playing field we have an adventure playground. It was built by fathers of children who came to Bunny school in 1980.The parish council look after it. In our adventure playground there are six {beams}joined together in a cross shape and you balance on them. We enjoy walking up the{spiral stairs}they look like a rocket. There are wooden{poles to walk up like a flight of 4 steps. There are also two{steel poles}hanging in a tall frame, they are used for climbing up.A large{net}is stretched across a frame, it is very strong.We have two{swings}and a climbing pole with feet grips each side. There are some{metal bars}to swing on and lastly there are some old{logs}on which the infants play. At the side of the playground is a long jump{sandpit}and sometimes the children play there.
